enith Feursel was a member of the Greycloaks of Evereska who ventured out from his home city in the late 15 century DR.
He had light skin, a prominent chin, and wavy chestnut hair.
In his studies as a cleric, Zenith chose to focus on the light domain of divine magic.
After serving with his fellow Greycloaks of Evereska, Zeniths wanderlust saw him leave his home city and travel the breadth of Faer√ªn. His journey was ultimately cut short however in in the . He was killed by a group of raiders aligned with the cultist of the Absolute. Zenith was among the dozen individuals chosen by the entity Withers to aid in his campaign against the Dead Three. It may be implied that Zenith was the son of another elven Greycloak of Evereska, Xan, having his father noted as being a dour mannered man who (rightfully) claimed that Zenith was doomed.
